title: 1 Acre Land With Close Proximity to Kite Lagoon
details:
Property Ref : Jahan-01

This is a 1 acre property located less than 100 meters from the Kalpitiya kite lagoon and is a second block with lagoon accesss.

The land is right adjacent to Luna Laguna resort and Kitelantis resort. Land is ideal for personal holiday home or any other tourism project and has a high commercial value.

The land is elevated and is populated with young palm trees,

The land comes with -

- Electricity
- Drinking Water
- Good Road Access
- Fully fenced
- Clear Deed And Title

Price has been marked down for urgent sale,

Asking price LKR 6mln/Acre

If interested please contact us on 07777 33823 for further details.

Thanks for looking :)
